name: The Purrfect Crime
description:
After getting a score you're happy with, return to the windowsill you started the game at and press W to complete the game.

-------------

KNOWN BUGS:

* Platforms broke right before we uploaded the game - naturally. If you're falling through them, try jumping from a different angle or playing the executable version.

* After beating the boss fight, you might not be able to reach the exit.

To fix this, push the boss' body underneath the windowsill and bounce on his belly - then press W when the 'exit' sprite shows up. If his body is stuck in the right corner, for example, you'd need to face left, jump right, and attack until he's un-stuck.

-------------

The Purrfect Crime was created for Palette Jam 2  with 8 colours in 10 days. 

You play as a cat with an awful owner that tried to abandon you in favour of a new pet dog - show him how terrible of an idea that was by breaking into his house, smashing everything, and getting out before he gets home!
